title: Facilitate Group Communication for Social Engagement
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to support group communications among my patients so that I can help socially isolated individuals connect with each other and maintain their emotional well-being.

title: Adaptive Social Engagement Strategies
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to customize social engagement strategies based on my patients' health status and mobility so that I can effectively support socially isolated patients and enhance their emotional well-being.

title: Community Support Network Integration – Connection to Local Support Groups and Clubs
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to connect my socially isolated patients with local support groups and clubs so that they can engage in community activities and enhance their emotional wellbeing.

title: Safety and Well-Being Check-Ins
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to prompt my patients to report their well-being regularly so that I can monitor their emotional and physical health effectively, especially for those who are socially isolated.
